message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value to us, I am proposing a price of $950000 for it.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am hoping to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $850000?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price. In order to reach an agreement, I am willing to consider a price of $900000 for the product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $875000 for the product.
I appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. Considering the value it brings to your business, I am willing to offer it to you for $890000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am still working within a specific budget. I would like to propose a price of $885000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to offer the product to you for $887500.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $882500 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I am willing to consider a price of $885000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. I would like to propose a final price of $880000 for the product.
